title: What are your bans now?

replies.body:
{{champion:412}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:266}} OR {{champion:421}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:59}} 
Usually the ones i ban.
I still ban yi. He's a bronze anus destroyer.

People with snowball potentail/Strong AND Popular champions with a high winrate (cheek on LoLking)
Say, last year Thresh had a 73% winrate, I ALWAYS banned thresh. Wasn't having none a dat.

Nidalee is on my ban list. I once suggested it as a ban and one of our team mates was like "lol what you noobs shes only being played lots because of her new skin".

Many "..." were shared amongst the team. 

I tried nidalee for the first time ever and she seems extremely broken. I don't even need items. Boots and I'm good to go.

J4 , riven , kat/fizz

{{champion:59}}  is a must ban for me, his cc and ganking potential is too much
Kat j4 and whtever else i dont really give a stuff anymore, someone always feeds the kat

{{champion:55}}  100% ban If she gets picked I dodge, it doesn't matter if she is 0/5 in lane it will always be I did well then she got fed off you guys.


Other than that  {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:35}}
